Release

1.5

1.4.2_1

1.4.2

1.4.1

1.4

1.3

1.2

1.1

1.0.1

1.0

Beta

Coming soon

Beta 5

Beta 4

Beta 3

Beta 2

Beta 1b

Beta 1a

Online

1.5 Online

1.4-Online

Snapshots

1.3

Snapshot 1

Added medium difficulty levels,

Snapshot 2

* fixed bug causing game to crash in second tutorial level
* Continue option and level select works again
* changes to some medium levels
* fixed attempts counter displaying score instead of number of attempts
* respawn time is now 0,5 sec instead of 1 sec .
+ Added score counter
+ Added FPS meter
+ Added option to convert old save files to new format

Snapshot 3

– Added 4 new hard levels
– fixed some minor bugs

Snapshot 3 Update 1:
– fixed duplicated timer in hard level 4
– removed spike at the start in hard level 3
– changed “press f11 to exit full screen” to …toggle fullscreen

Snapshot  4
– New tutorial (I might have forgotten to change all stuff to refer to new tutorial. Be aware of game crash. If you get crash report, copy it or screenshot it!)
– Added credits after you finish the game
– Reduced the game size by 2MB
– Added more names to credits

Snapshoz 4, Update 1
– Fixed blurry creduts
– Fixed bug where Pressing PLAY button takes you to the old tutorial
– fixed some other minor bugs

Snapshot 5
– Fixed bug in medium level selection screen where you couldnt acces first medium level
– added speedrun timer
– font size of score, attempts, fps etc. was made smaller

Snapshot 6
– added option to hide fps meter
– fully implemented speedrun timer
– minor graphics changes
– minor bugfixes

Release Candidate 2
– fixed incorrect calculation of speedrun time
– fixed score counter
– made HUD smaller and less distracting

Final (snapshot) version (hopefully)
– (finally) fixed all issues with speedrun timer
– credits music doesnt play if music is disabled
– minor graphics changes

1.5

Snapshot 1

* Fixed links on working in chromium browsers
* Open folder buttons now open corresponding folder in system’s file explroer

+ Confirmation dialog to reset progress button
+ Reset settings button (also with confirmation dialog box)
+ Added Open speedrun record folder button
+ Added Open custom levels folder button

1.4

Snapshot 1

– Added icons to main menu buttons
– Report button moved below Quit button
– Code optimizations
– Fixed level numbers – Level: 1.01 Level 1

– Cheats/Debug mode update
– Level don’t save while cheats are enabled
– Notice in middle bottom when cheats are enabled

– Full keyboard control and navigation (not fully implemented yet)
*Work in progress. may be changed
– Press Alt to show keyboard shortcuts

 

Snapshot 2

– Options update
– Settings divided into categories
– Added more options:
– Toggle between game’s or Windows’ mouse pointer
– Enable keyboard/no mouse navigation
– All game settings are now saved in a file, so the settings don’t get reset every time the game is run

– Level saving update
– Level information (attempts, current level etc.) is also now saved into a file
– (working on) Game progress is now saved in single file instead of 29 individual empty files

– File system update
– All files are now saved in appropriate directories instead of in the game’s root folder

 

Snapshot 3a

* Fixed game crashing after finishing a speedrun.
* Fixed game crashing when pressing Level 10 in easy level select.

* Level countdown turns yellow when there’s less than 5 seconds left
* Fixed speedrun timer overlapping with attempts counter.
* Fixed level difficulty displaying “NotALevel”.
* Fixed not being able to unlock 1st medium and hard level in level select.
* Fixed level numbers overlapping with locked level icon in level selection
* Fixed issue where player kept moving after finishing a level which lead to few nerly instant deaths.

* Unlocked levels are now stored in a sinlg file instead of creating an empty file for each level.
* Changed layout of settings screen.

+ Added 5th hard level button to level seelct.
+ Added @FJB to playtesters page.

– Removed score. (May be repurposed in the future)
– Deleted some old useless files.

 

snapshot 3b

* Fixed speedrun mode
* Report button should now open the correct adress
* slightly reduced size of spike hitbox

 

snapshot 4

* Presing R now counts as an attempt.
* Fixed credits music using old settings to check if sound is enabled.
* Updated keyboard navigation scripts.

* Renamed tutorial levels from roomTUT<number>_N to roomTUT<number>. (This naming is leftover from 1.3 snapshot 4 where old tutorial was replaced with newer, better version.)
* Renamed key sprite from spr_star to spr_key (Another very old leftover)

+ Re-added keyboard navigation to options
+ Added button for 5th hard level in level selection

 

snapshot 5

* Fixed ground block in medium 6 being slightly higher which avoided player from moving to the right withiut having to jump.
* Fixed getting stuck in-between platforms in tutorial.

+ Every speedrun statistics is now saved in Black_Box_Jumper\Speedrun records.
* Speedrun statistics can be opened from the game’s speedrun finished screen.
+ Every level statistics are now stored in Black_Box_Jumper\Game data\Level statisctics. (Work in progress)
*Resetting progress replaces all levels status with “false” instead of deleting the file (it basically changes nothing, but it looks better)

It looks like there’s not much new stuff, but imagine in how many ways the saved data can be used.
(I may have also forgotten to list some stuff)

 

Releace candidate 1

+ Added visual feedback to screenshot

* Fixed F2 (screenashot) and F11 (fullscreen) not working in some cases
* Changed_updated what!s shown on tutorial complete screen
* other bugfixes
